definition: various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Thev artist does all the active work, makes the biggest emotional investment.
sentences.chinese: 藝術家獨攬了所有的創造性工作，投入了大量的心血。

sentences.english: You swipe up and down to scroll lists of, say, tracks or artists.
sentences.chinese: 你可以上下滑動來滾動列表，比如，藝術家列表。

sentences.english: Fall is the artist. (Takayuki Ikkaku, Arisa Hosaka and Toshihiro Kawabata)
Some called the artist brave and hardworking.
sentences.chinese: 有些所謂的藝術家勤勞勇敢的。

sentences.english: He’s perhaps the most well-known painter from all of the 20:th century.
sentences.chinese: 他或許是近一個世紀以來最負盛名的藝術家。

sentences.english: The main concern is, whether those cartoonists are able to carry on their carrers as artists, just as they have been before?
sentences.chinese: 漫畫家能否再像以前一樣，作爲藝術家而生存？

sentences.english: To have governments pay for all education and healthcare expenses can become quite a fiscal burden.
sentences.chinese: 資助個人藝術家可能會成爲政府的一大財政負擔。

sentences.english: Some artists living in China are at the doorsill to this segment.
sentences.chinese: 一些生活在中國的藝術家處在這個階段的門檻上。

sentences.english: There would be artists, of course, who would try topaint this scene.
sentences.chinese: 那裏會有藝術家，當然，誰會試着畫這樣一幅景。

sentences.english: When the program began artists received eight hundred fifty dollars.
sentences.chinese: 當程序開始的藝術家收到八百五十美元。

sentences.english: Then why not call Bearden a Black American artist?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，爲什麼不把比爾敦稱作一個美國黑人藝術家呢？

sentences.english: Thank you to the Great Leader and artist in our city, Thank you Mr. LU.
sentences.chinese: 感謝本城的傑出領導者和藝術家，陸先生。

sentences.english: Have you ever bought any of the artists' work at Union Square?
sentences.chinese: 你在聯合廣場買過藝術家的作品嗎？

sentences.english: Oxana Yablonskaya is a Yamaha Artist.
sentences.chinese: 雅布隆斯卡婭還是雅馬哈藝術家。

sentences.english: Design your own card paper with the help of a visual artist in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 設計你的視覺藝術家幫助自己的紙卡在此免費視頻。

sentences.english: An artist makes a papercut portrait of US President Obama at the Yu Gardens in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海豫園，藝術家在製作剪紙的奧巴馬頭像。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to come from (a place)/From: (in email header)
